title: Social Networking Writing Training through Blog-Based Remote Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English writing proficiency and experience with Web 2.0 tools
context.additional_context: Provision of digital devices (tablets/laptops) and blog platforms to facilitate learner interaction.

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least 15 idea units (IUs) through blog-based collaborative discussions held at least twice weekly over four weeks.
Learners can provide at least three specific suggestions (grammar/content/structure) on peers' writing using digital feedback tools.
Learners can accurately utilize appropriate linguistic expressions (expository/argumentative) for task types by over 80% when completing topic-based blog projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
